text:
### SCENE 23 – Tree-Side Teasing  

_At a random tree, sitting together._

**Heroine (laughing):** Intha muddhu-muddhu ga matladithe evaryna padipotaaru. Entha mandhi ni ila padesav!  
**Hero:** Antha memes prabhavam… and aa first lucky girl *nuvve*.  
**Heroine:** Confirm-ga veediki girlfriend undhi ani anukoni evaru raledhu emo. _(sarcastic)_  
**Hero (scoffs):** Nuvvu annadhi nijam aina bagunnu. Poni dhairyam chesi maname oka step munduku veddam ani anukunna—sare, aa principal na grades tho paruvu teestadu.  

> *_Future-flash  (scene 53 placeholder)_*  
> *Heroine:* Future lo em avudham ani ankuntunnav?  
> *Hero:* Manchi director avvali; nuvvu?  
> *Heroine:* Naku **archivist** avvali ani undhi…  
> *(dialogue continues)*

**Heroine:** I like your voice.  
**Hero:** Mee too.  
**Heroine:** Ha… I love you.  
**Hero:** *I love me too.*  
**Heroine:** **Fuck you.**  
**Hero:** *Mee too… what?*  
_Heroine laughs._  

**Heroine:** Intiki ra repu; nannu pick chesko—bayataki veldam.  
<!-- contains_profanity: yes | end Scene 23 -->

---
